docs.text: ConfIDent-schema schema This is a schema for the ConfIDent project that describes the necessary metadata requirements of academic events and event series. Classes City Container Contributor Country Deadline Location Metric Organisation - An organization such as a company or university Organizer Person - A person (alive, dead, undead, or fictional). PlannedProcess AcademicEvent AcademicEventSeries ProcessName ProcessRelation Region Sponsor Venue Mixins Slots academic_fields address alternative_ids at_location contact contributors ➞deadline_date ➞deadline_other deadlines end_date AcademicEvent➞end_date event_mode event_status AcademicEvent➞event_status events id Organisation➞id Person➞id in_series AcademicEvent➞in_series ➞city ➞country ➞lattitude ➞longitude ➞meeting_url ➞region ➞venue logo ➞int_value ➞other_metric ➞rate_value ➞str_value ➞truth_value metrics name Organisation➞name Person➞name first_name last_name ordinal organisations organizers AcademicEvent➞organizers outputs persons ➞name ➞name_type process_name related_to series series_of AcademicEventSeries➞series_of sponsors AcademicEvent➞sponsors start_date AcademicEvent➞start_date summary topics type AcademicEvent➞type Contributor➞type Deadline➞type Metric➞type ProcessRelation➞type website Enums ContributorType DeadlineType EventMode EventStatus EventType MetricType NameType RelationType Subsets Types Built in Bool Decimal ElementIdentifier NCName NodeIdentifier URI URIorCURIE XSDDate XSDDateTime XSDTime float int str Defined Boolean ( Bool ) - A binary (true or false) value Date ( XSDDate ) - a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar Datetime ( XSDDateTime ) - The combination of a date and time Decimal ( Decimal ) - A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal specification Double ( float ) - A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float ( float ) - A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer ( int ) - An integer Ncname ( NCName ) - Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier ( NodeIdentifier ) - A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model. Objectidentifier ( ElementIdentifier ) - A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model. String ( str ) - A character string Time ( XSDTime ) - A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular day Uri ( URI ) - a complete URI Uriorcurie ( URIorCURIE ) - a URI or a CURIE
docs.title: Index

docs.text: Boolean ( Bool ) - A binary (true or false) value Date ( XSDDate ) - a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar Datetime ( XSDDateTime ) - The combination of a date and time Decimal ( Decimal ) - A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal specification Double ( float ) - A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float ( float ) - A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer ( int ) - An integer Ncname ( NCName ) - Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier ( NodeIdentifier ) - A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model. Objectidentifier ( ElementIdentifier ) - A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model. String ( str ) - A character string Time ( XSDTime ) - A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular day Uri ( URI ) - a complete URI Uriorcurie ( URIorCURIE ) - a URI or a CURIE
